DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy of Diamel administration in the treatment of Polycystic Ovary Syndrome. The duration of this double-blind placebo controlled phase 3 clinical trial will be 24 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Diamel in the Treatment of Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Two of the following criteria: Oligo or Anovulation Polycystic Ovary diagnosed by ultrasound technique Clinical signs of Hyperandrogenism Signed informed consent Personal history of other causes of hyperandrogenism: Hyperprolactinemia, suprarenal tumors, ovary tumors, suprarenal hyperplasia, hypercortisolism. Patients under other experimental treatment Treatment with ovulation inducers and/or insulin sensitizers within 60 days before treatment Treatment with vitamins within 7 days before treatment Treatment with dietary supplements within 60 days before treatment Noncompensated intercurrent diseases: diabetes mellitus, thyroid disease, hypertension
